Posts.Content: carissabforlife wrote: I was called by the radiologist a couple hours ago while at work with the results of my biopsy.  I have Invasive Ductal Carcinoma.  I am 32 years old married with 3 children.  I never thought this would happen!  I have been reading these discussion boards since my abnormal mammogram 2 weeks ago hoping I wouldn't have to need the support from this website but I guess I was wrong.  I am unhappy with my diagnosis but relieved that this website exists where I can talk to others with the same feelings and issues.  Thanks for listening to my ramblings....  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: In Total Shock!!!!!!! carissabforlife Kiko
